titles: Meditations and discourses on the glory of Christ, in his person, office, and grace with the differences between faith and sight applied unto the use of them that believe / by the late Reverend John Owen, D.D.
author: Owen, John, 1616-1683.
publisher: Printed by B.A. and are to be sold by most booksellers in London,
notes: Imperfect; stained, cropped, and tightly bound, with loss of print. Pages beginning-p.35 from defective Huntington Library copy spliced at end.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
